title: Add AdSense/domain verification file to website root

requirements.summary: Create a static Google site verification file at the website root for AdSense verification
acceptanceCriteria: The file `frontend/public/f8073e773aa7cba5922a.txt` exists in the repository.
Navigating to `/f8073e773aa7cba5922a.txt` on the deployed site returns a 200 response with the verification token content.
The file is not blocked by `robots.txt` and is accessible without authentication.
No other pages or routes are modified by this change.

file_operations.description: Create a plain text verification file containing 'google-site-verification: f8073e773aa7cba5922a' that will be served as a static asset at the root path `/f8073e773aa7cba5922a.txt` for Google AdSense domain verification. This file must be placed in the `frontend/public/` directory to ensure it is automatically served at the root URL without requiring any routing changes.
